## Code and data of a manuscript on inferring phenological drivers from landsat time series submitted to Biogeosciences

Reference: Senf and Krueger. Inferring drivers of changing land surface phenology from Landsat time series.

All data used for reproducing the figures and results are in the subfolder 'data'. All code is in the 'lib' folder, with the actual model contained in the 'lib/model' folder. The results and figures of the manuscript are in the 'results' and 'figures' folder, respectively.
